snippet: The Congressional Budget Office recently estimated that if the federal minimum wage were to rise to $10.10, a total of 16.5 million workers would make more money.
abstract: The Congressional Budget Office recently estimated that if the federal minimum wage were to rise to $10.10, a total of 16.5 million workers would make more money.

headline.main: Trying to Understand the Impact of a Higher Minimum Wage on Small Businesses
